mapper.select: SELECT id, first_name, last_name, work_phone, cell_phone, email_id, date_of_birth, street, city, state, zip_code from ADDRESS_BOOK
select id, first_name, last_name, work_phone, cell_phone, email_id, date_of_birth, street, city, state, zip_code from ADDRESS_BOOK WHERE email_id = #{emailId}
select id, first_name, last_name, work_phone, cell_phone, email_id, date_of_birth, street, city, state, zip_code from ADDRESS_BOOK WHERE first_name = #{firstName} and date_of_birth=#{dateOfBirth}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADDRESS_BOOK(first_name, last_name, work_phone, cell_phone,email_id, date_of_birth, street, city, state, zip_code) VALUES(#{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{workPhoneNumber}, #{cellNumber},#{emailId},#{dateOfBirth}, #{street}, #{city}, #{state}, #{zip})
mapper.update: UPDATE ADDRESS_BOOK SET work_phone= #{workPhoneNumber}, cell_phone= #{cellNumber}, street = #{street}, city = #{city}, state = #{state}, zip_code = #{zip} WHERE id = #{id}
